name: Recluse (chambers)
description:
This is a re-upload of a game made in 2012 for Ludum Dare 23, whose theme was "Tiny World". I wonder if anyone remembers this?

Recluse is a short and innovative platformer about expanding your horizon. Play as a socially withdrawn snail who never left its shell and try to find a way out of a recluse lifestyle. For an additional challenge, try to find all 4 hidden secrets!

  • Ludum Dare 23: 1st place in “Innovation” category
  • Ludum Dare 23: 8th in “Overall” category
  • SB Games 2012: Best Game Developed by Student.

Known issues:

  • The screen flashes in some computers while the main mechanic is being activated.
  • The game window might be too small in some high-resolution screens.
